segments.text: I notice the bright daylight coming through the kitchen window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's in her apron, drying dishes so meticulously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's completely oblivious to the faucet running full blast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is cascading over the sink, pooling on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle is spreading, and it's going to ruin everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her shoe is wet, but she keeps on as if nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the boy is precariously perched on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's fishing cookies out of the jar like a little thief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's helping by holding out her hand for one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just sloppy and irresponsible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Wet floors and unstable climbingâ€” what a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tidy garden outside makes the inside look even worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such carelessness in a home.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They need to clean up and supervise better.
segments.speaker: PAR
